name: NBA Courtside 2: Featuring Kobe Bryant
description:
NBA Courtside 2: Featuring Kobe Bryant is a basketball video game developed by Left Field Productions and published by Nintendo for the Nintendo 64. The game was released in North America exclusively on October 31, 1999. It is the sequel to Kobe Bryant in NBA Courtside and features NBA star Kobe Bryant on its cover. Bryant also performed the motion capture for the game.

The third and final edition in the Courtside series, NBA Courtside 2002 was released for the GameCube in 2002.
